mil3.5.1:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.5.1:0.3_0: and development of the Buddha’s wise.
mil3.5.1:1.12_0: “Sir, even though I’ve seen a riverbank to bathe in my father, I am unable to cross a river by my father.”
mil3.5.1:1.13_0: “In the same way, great king, I’ve seen the Buddha. But I haven’t seen, heard, or thought.”
mil3.5.1:1.6_0: “Well then, sir, the Buddha has nothing.”
mil3.5.1:1.7_0: “But great king, what have you seen the Himalayas, the king of mountains?”
mil3.5.1:1.9_0: “My father, are you seen the river Aciravatī?”
mil3.5.1:3.1_0: There is no, and possession of the Buddha.
